examples: wc?class MATH 135: Get information about MATH 135
wc?class MATH 135 -p 2: Get second page of classes for MATH 135
wc?class MATH 135 -t 1215: Get information about MATH 135 in Spring 2021 (which has termcode 1215)
wc?class MATH 135 -c 6067: Get information about class with number 6067 for MATH 135
